page.title: 15HEALTH, HOUSING
page.content: state of flux as the interior building space appears in the state of being doubled. Working here are 3 doctors, 2 community nurses, 1 Health Visitor, along with 2 receptionists who cover a rural area of 800 sq km. Our nearest hospital and ambulance station are in Barnstaple, 35 km away. There is a cottage hospital in South Molton some 20 km away. We have a local fire sta. {HOUSING}Some 400 residences with 80 % owning their own. Most common, and the oldest houses, are those made of stone (and/or brick) with cob. Brick houses, well in evidence since the '30/40s are the next most common. Thereafter those of timber interiors and breeze- block exteriors, most of which were built during the last decade. Variety of differing types built at different times make up the village. Approx equal numbers have slate and tile
